content: {"score": 82, "rationale": "Good diagnostic reasoning with appropriate consideration of differential diagnoses."}
{"score": 67, "rationale": "Treatment plan follows guidelines but lacks patient-specific adjustments."}
{"score": 91, "rationale": "Excellent prognostic assessment with realistic timeline and clear communication."}
{"score": 74, "rationale": "Risk identification is adequate but missing some secondary complications."}
{"score": 58, "rationale": "Follow-up plan needs more specific monitoring parameters and escalation criteria."}
{"score": 88, "rationale": "Strong evidence-based approach with comprehensive consideration of subcriteria."}
{"score": 45, "rationale": "Significant gaps in assessment. Key factors were not addressed."}
{"score": 79, "rationale": "Solid overall assessment with minor areas for improvement in documentation."}
{"score": 95, "rationale": "Outstanding analysis covering all subcriteria with detailed justification."}
{"score": 63, "rationale": "Adequate but could benefit from more thorough risk-benefit analysis."}
{"score": 71, "rationale": "Reasonable assessment but timeline and milestones could be more specific."}
{"score": 86, "rationale": "Well-structured evaluation with good integration of clinical evidence."}
